objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Sports/Competition themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Sports/Competition narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Sports/Competition lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a competitive sports scenario involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a sports context
Students engage in sports themed role-play about technology in daily life using slang register
Students create original sports themed content about technology in daily life in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Sports/Competition scenario?
What competition or victory might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Sports/Competition story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Sports/Competition perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this sports scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Sports/Competition situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using slang register in sports context
Character B: Responding in slang register within sports theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with competition
technology in daily life with victory
technology in daily life with training

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Sports/Competition theme: Athletic challenges, competition, teamwork

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Sports/Competition themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
